mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GIFT_CARD (GIFT_CARD_ID, GIFT_CARD_NAME, MEMBER_ID, GIFT_CARD_GRANT_DATE, GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE, BALANCE, FOOD_TYPE, IS_USED) VALUES (GIFT_CARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{giftCardName}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{giftCardExpiredDate}, #{balance}, #{foodType}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND (FOOD_TYPE = #{foodType} OR FOOD_TYPE = '전체') ORDER BY GIFT_CARD_GRANT_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE GIFT_CARD_NAME = #{giftCardName} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE GIFT_CARD_NAME = '생일 축하 기프트카드' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE SYSDATE < GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE AND IS_USED = 0 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE (SYSDATE >= GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE OR BALANCE = 0) AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE IS_USED = 1 AND SYSDATE < GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE AND BALANCE != 0 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GIFT_CARD_GRANT_DATE DESC) AS RN, GIFT_CARD.* FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND SYSDATE < GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE AND IS_USED = 0 ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE GIFT_CARD GC SET GC.BALANCE = GC.BALANCE - ( SELECT P.TOTAL_PRICE FROM PREORDER P WHERE P.PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId} AND P.MEMBER_ID = GC.MEMBER_ID ), GC.IS_USED = '1' WHERE GC.GIFT_CARD_ID = #{giftCardId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PREORDER P WHERE P.PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId} AND P.MEMBER_ID = GC.MEMBER_ID AND GC.BALANCE >= P.TOTAL_PRICE)

UPDATE GIFT_CARD GC SET GC.BALANCE = GC.BALANCE + ( SELECT P.TOTAL_PRICE FROM PREORDER P WHERE P.PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId} AND P.MEMBER_ID = GC.MEMBER_ID ), GC.IS_USED = '1' WHERE GC.GIFT_CARD_ID = #{giftCardId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PREORDER P WHERE P.PREORDER_ID = #{preorderId} AND P.MEMBER_ID = GC.MEMBER_ID)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GIFT_CARD WHERE GIFT_CARD_EXPIRED_DATE < SYSDATE - INTERVAL '30' DAY
